tag.name: hgis:imagery_confirmed
tag.description: If/how the geometry was validated against imagery.

tag.name: hgis:imagery_confirmed=confirmed
tag.description: You can look at the point and tell what it is (e.g. mosque or airport)

tag.name: hgis:imagery_confirmed=reported
tag.description: Imagery is pixelated or cloudy -- can not be assessed.

tag.name: hgis:imagery_confirmed=assessed
tag.description: The point is on a building, but you can't verify its type (e.g. hair salon).

tag.name: hgis:accuracy
tag.description: The accuracy of a geometry. This has its own tag because it doesn't fit cleanly into any other accuracy definition.
